Dear Ms. Martin,

Thank you for contacting NexTech Solutions regarding your employment verification request.

I can confirm the following information:

Jane Smith
• Current employment status: Full-time employee
• Position: Software Engineer II
• Start date: April 2019

Jacob Johnson
• Current employment status: Full-time employee
• Position: Senior Data Analyst
• Start date: September 2018

In accordance with our policy on employee data security, salary details are provided only through secure channels. Kindly let me know the best way to transmit this information—either via your secure portal or by phone—and I will be happy to do so promptly.

Please feel free to reach out if you require any additional assistance.

Best regards,

John
HR Representative | NexTech Solutions
